description:
Ben is 18 and just started college. He's studying to become a physical therapist.
He's gay and said he came out shortly after graduating from high school.
"How are you adjusting so far?"
"Um, rough spots," he said. "But other than that it's going good. It's actually a big relief!"
I love how these guys coming out of high school are so confident and comfortable with themselves! Things have changed a lot since I was their age!
"So, what kind of guys do you like?"
"Latin, mostly," he said. "Muscle built!"
He knows what he wants! And he's pretty muscle built himself...
"Are you a top or bottom?"
"Bottom," he replied. "But known to be a top!"
title: Ben
